name: Blitz Alien 3D
description:
Controls are described in the Game.
Press and hold the 'Esc' key to pause the game. Our home planet Earth is being outrun by the aliens. They want to invade our home planet. Their Invasion will be inevitable but can you try to make a last stand against them.

In this Alien shooter game, the player takes the control of a futuristic turret to stop the aliens from destroying our home planet "EARTH". Our planet is calling out for fighters!  Will you take the opportunity?
